name: Critical Failure
description: Full throttle zombie wave-based survival. The world's first VIDEO GAME CONTROLLED LIVE ACTION ZOMBIE SERIES. Your actions make an impact on the show named the same title. We plan on taking you through a story telling experience as you have fun with friends and family killing hordes of zombies. There is a faction war happening between four factions known as, WITCH'S, BIKER'S, MARAUDER'S, AND HACKER'S. Upon starting your first game you will be asked what faction you plan on fighting for, but no worries, if you grow tired of one faction than you can switch to another whenever you may like. Through the faction war you will be at war with the other three factions as you push waves of zombie hordes away from your home , "NO MAN'S LAND". There will be Suprise live events as well as pvp game modes added to spice things up a bit between factions. We hope you enjoy the growing community of CRITICAL FAILURE.
